name: Flower Defense (yokuday)
description:
Flower Defense is a tower defense game with the flower as the centerpiece. This is our second game jam! The enemies are incoming in waves while you collect resources and build powerful turrets and traps!

Controls:

WASD to move; Mouse to aim; Left-click(or hold) to shoot; Q/Esc to open/close the store catalog; (you can scroll in the store)

To buy, click on the desired item and the hit the buy button. Place it down with left click or cancel your purchase with the right-click!

This game has 4 different kind of enemies, 20 unique waves and a juicy ending.
